entries.73f8b5e78803: Replix IDE is a community-driven code library that allows you to share, discover, and collaborate on code snippets with ease. Join us today and unlock the power of code sharing! Replix (replix.co.in) ‚Äî All-in-one online IDE & compiler for C, C++, Java, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Go, Rust, C#, Ruby, Swift and more. Build, run, debug, share code, join competitive programming events, host contests, and learn with bite-sized lessons ‚Äî now with AI-assisted judging, auto-debugging, embedded code snippets and progress tracking. Host DSA/CP contests, share code gists, learn with 100+ bite-sized lessons, track progress, and accelerate development with AI-powered code generation and debugging.
